item.title: WebbAlert
item.dc:creator: josephscott

item.content:encoded:
Remember RocketBoom? Remember the last time you watched it? Me neither.

Today a new video blog started, WebbAlert, hosted by Morgan Webb. Yes, that Morgan Webb, from X-Play. I’m going to agree with Michael Arrington on this, it reminded me a lot of RocketBoom, only better. The initial episode did have a commercial for Make magazine in the middle of it, but it was pretty short and to the point.

The design for WebbAlert.com was done by Deane’s company Blend and appears to be hosted by Federated Media.

I’ve subscribed to the feed for webbalert, hoping that it will stand the test of time better than rocketboom did.
